org.springdata.cassandra.convert

Class AbstractCassandraConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springdata.cassandra.convert.AbstractCassandraConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CassandraConverter, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.data.convert.EntityConverter<CassandraPersistentEntity<?>,CassandraPersistentProperty,Object,Object>, org.springframework.data.convert.EntityReader<Object,Object>, org.springframework.data.convert.EntityWriter<Object,Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MappingCassandraConverter

    public abstract class AbstractCassandraConverter
extends Object
implements CassandraConverter, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Base class for CassandraConverter implementations. Sets up a GenericConversionService and populates basic converters.
    Author:
    Alex Shvid
